title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu: a simple, screen-guided learning kit for children aged 4 to 10.

What it is:
- A set of three playful learning kits: Count (math), Letters (words), and Link (puzzles).
- Children use sturdy, magnetic blocks on a foldable gamepad while a phone or tablet shows friendly, step‑by‑step activities.

What kids learn:
- Math: counting and basic arithmetic.
- Words: spelling, vocabulary, and comprehension.
- Thinking skills: problem‑solving and fine‑motor control.

Why it’s easy and safe:
- No extra purchases in the app. It’s free to download.
- 15 interactive games with over 750 levels that adjust to your child’s level (Pre‑K to Grade 4).
- Durable pieces with no small batteries or charging needed. The device is not included.

What’s in the box:
- 3 kits: Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, Plugo Link.
- 1 foldable Plugo Gamepad with a slot to hold your phone or tablet.

How to use (in three steps):
1) Place your phone or tablet in the gamepad slot.
2) Download the free “Plugo” app from the App Store or Play Store.
3) Follow the on‑screen prompts. Your child places the magnetic pieces on the mat to play and learn.

Good to know about devices:
- Apple: Works with iPhone 6 and newer, iPad 5th Gen and newer. Does not support iPad Mini 1 or iPad Pro 12.9”.
- Android: Needs Android 8 or higher, 2 GB RAM or more, front camera at the top center, and tablets under 10 inches.
- Amazon Fire: Works with Fire 7 (2022), Fire HD 8 (2018, 2020), Fire HD 8+ (2020).
- Unsure? You can check compatibility on the PlayShifu website.

Perfect for:
- Boys and girls ages 4–10.
- Grandparents who want a quiet, mess‑free, educational gift that children can enjoy independently or together with you.

In short:
Plugo turns screen time into learning time. Your grandchild moves real pieces; the app gives instant feedback, praise, and gentle guidance. It’s fun, simple to set up, and grows with your child’s skills.
